fees.waiverText: No annual fee waiver mentioned; contact bank for retention offers

rewards.name: Travel Points
rewards.earningText: 2 Travel Points per ₹100 on domestic spends (0.5% value back)
rewards.joiningBonus: MakeMyTrip voucher worth ₹3,000 on first transaction within 30 days
rewards.exclusions: International transactions, Fuel, Utilities, Insurance, Quasi-Cash, Railways, Real Estate, Education, Wallet loads, Govt Services, EMI conversions

calculator.specialLogic: NO reward points on international transactions despite 0% forex. 2.5X (5 RP/₹100) on travel spends only.

redemption.bestOption: Redeem for flight/hotel bookings via RBL Rewards portal

lounge.domestic: 2 per quarter (spend ₹35,000 in previous quarter from July 2025)
lounge.international: 2 per year (Priority Pass) + 1 extra on ₹50K quarterly spend

golf.text: 4 complimentary green fee rounds/year + 1 free golf lesson/month (MasterCard only)

forex.text: 0% Forex Markup - India's first retail card with zero forex markup

insurance.text: Complimentary international travel insurance covering trip delay, baggage loss, passport loss, dental treatment, personal liability

concierge.text: 24x7 Concierge Desk for golf, hotel, dining, spa reservations

metadata.bestFor: International travelers seeking 0% forex markup and travel-focused rewards
metadata.verdict: Best-in-class card for international spends with zero forex markup, though no reward points on foreign transactions
pros: 0% forex markup on all international transactions
Complimentary international travel insurance
Priority Pass membership with 2 free international lounge visits
2.5X rewards on travel spends
MMT voucher worth ₹3,000 as welcome benefit
cons: NO reward points earned on international transactions
Annual fee of ₹3,000 with no waiver option
Lounge access now requires ₹35K quarterly spend

name: RBL Insignia Preferred Banking World Credit Card

fees.waiverText: Waived on ₹10L annual spend; FREE for Insignia Preferred Banking customers

eligibility.specialCriteria: Insignia Banking: ₹30L TRV or ₹10L AMB in Current Account

rewards.earningText: 5 RP per ₹100 on domestic (1.25%), 10 RP per ₹100 on international (2.5%)
rewards.joiningBonus: 28,000 Reward Points on first transaction within 30 days (Not applicable for Insignia Banking customers)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Utilities, Insurance, Quasi-Cash, Railways, Real Estate, Education, Wallet loads, Govt Services, EMI conversions

lounge.international: 6 per year via Priority Pass membership

hotels.text: Marriott, Accor, IHG, Shangri-La benefits - early check-in, late checkout, upgrades, breakfast

metadata.bestFor: High Net Worth Individuals seeking premium lifestyle benefits and international travel perks
metadata.verdict: Excellent premium card for HNIs with comprehensive benefits; free for Insignia Banking customers
pros: Free for Insignia Preferred Banking customers
High reward rate: 2.5% on international spends
6 international lounge visits via Priority Pass
Lower forex markup at 1.5%
₹500 off on movies twice monthly
Premium hotel benefits across major chains
cons: Domestic reward rate of 1.25% is below super-premium standards
